title: Book- Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Co. by Jay Miller
author: bosoxphan

posts.post_title: Book- Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Co. by Jay Miller
posts.post_content: Brand new book. The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin and Co. (1886-1890) by Jay Miller etc. 457 pages. Unsure what its worth. Make me an offer.
It is worth over $250, fortunately they sell them for $125.  Incredible book, and I don't even collect Old Judges.
